item.description:
Join us for the 4th annual New Year Breakfast and ride!

Saturday is expected to be a balmy 33 Degrees with a 40% chance of snow showers - Typically anything under 50% means nothing or a flurry at most. and as you know - weather forecasters tend to lowball on temps.

We will be eating at a new place in Waltham called "In a Pickle". They rival Sound bites, and Ball square and are worth making the trip out even just to sample their fare once. I highly recommend the pancakes! I wanted to schedule this for Friday, but the restaurant is closed.

After Breakfast we will ride till 2-3 PM or the weather turns on us, which ever comes first.

As this is a breakfast event it is open to all members and there is no fee, even though there is a ride afterward.

Hope to see you there!

Paul

Rain/snow date TBA if event is cancelled
item.name: Take your scooter to Breakfast - 2010 Premiere
